entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , North Perth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:08 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , North Perth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:39 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 12:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -13.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -15.1°C
Wind: NNW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:55 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:55 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:55 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
